name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
detail: A personal finance classic that contrasts the mindset of the wealthy and the middle class

name: The Alchemist
detail: A philosophical novel about following one's dreams, as a young shepherd embarks on a journey to discover his personal legend.

name: Playing It My Way
detail: An inspiring autobiography of cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar, detailing his journey, struggles, and achievements in the sport.

name: Harry Potter
detail: A magical fantasy series following a young wizard, Harry Potter, as he discovers his destiny and battles the dark lord

name: The Last Outpost
detail: A gripping tale of survival and resilience,set in dystopian settings, where characters defend humanity’s final stronghold.

name: Power of Your Subconscious Mind
detail: A self-help classic that explores how harnessing the subconscious mind can transform one’s life through positive thinking.
